target: 把你的电浆球分为多个小球，在一条线上输出伤害。

source: Plasma balls have a smaller size.

target: 多个电浆球不会叠加伤害。

source: Throws a smoke bomb on the ground when you cast Black Hole, causing your enemies' screens to fade to black when they walk through it.
target: 施放黑洞时，往地上再扔个烟雾弹。敌方走过时会被烟雾弹造成黑屏。

source: Reduces the strength of Black Hole's slow.
Steals enemy bullets and seeks them back towards your enemies. This triggers the moment Bullet Time is disabled.
Increases your ammo whenever you hit an enemy and have Frenzy active.
target: 狂暴状态下命中敌方会增加自身弹药。

source: Teleports you to a targetted location after a short channelling time.
target: 少量轨道预备时间后，即刻传送自身到指定地点。

source: When you hit a shocked enemy they will emit sparks that damage nearby enemies.
Reduces the time that enemies stay shocked.
Fires lifestealing leeches that damage enemies and restore your health.
Leaves a trail on the ground where your poisoned enemies walk. Any other enemies who walk through this will become poisoned.
target: 在地上留下一道染毒痕迹，任何经过的敌人都会中毒。

source: Your venom dart will seek slower.
Summons an orb that increases the damage of your bullets when they fly through it.
Makes your leeches bounce off walls.
Creates a clone of you that confuses enemies when you leave invisibility.
Leaves vapor where your Plasma explodes that causes enemies to slide uncontrollably.
target: 电浆球爆炸时施放蒸汽，把敌人弹飞，并使其失去控制。
电浆球的伤害输出变小。

source: Pretty awful as a car. But it's cheap and makes a nice step for jumping over walls.
target: 作为载具来说太烂了，好在便宜，算是初期第一步吧。

source: Fast and agile - just watch out for the low health. If it catches on fire you'll burn.
target: 快速但脆弱的载具，看看那点血量吧，它要是着火了，你就跟着一起烧了算了。

source: Fast and durable - a great all-rounder. Can even withstand a direct shot from a Bazooka!
target: 又快又结实的载具，总体都不错，甚至能正面硬抗一发火箭筒！

source: A good combat vehicle great for co-op drivebys. Press [F3] to hop into the back seat.
target: 不错的战斗载具，尤其适合装载友军协作战斗。按[3]键可跳到背后进行360度的射击。

source: Has a radar the reveals the location of nearby enemies. Lets you see through walls and spy on your enemies' movements!
target: 此载具带有雷达，可发现附近敌人。拿它来当穿墙眼，透视敌人的行动吧！

source: Very durable for its price and with 6 seats it's great for co-op drivebys.
target: 就性价比而言，此载具超皮实，带6个座位尤其适合装载友军协作战斗。载客越多，载具自我恢复就越快，使得蹲点阴人者变得很难对付。

source: Fastest car in the game! Press [SHIFT] to boost and Tokyo Drift all over the place.
target: 游戏中最快的车！ 按[SHIFT]可以提升和东京漂移到处。

source: Comes with a ticking time bomb. [Left click] to toggle the timer on and off, but make sure you hop out before it explodes!
target: 此载具带有定时炸弹！按[鼠标左键]切换倒计时开/关状态，它爆炸时自己一定要离远点！

source: A huge truck with massive health and 5 passenger seats. The back 3 seats allow for a full 360 degree shooting range.
target: 血条超长的大型卡车，带5个座位，其中3个后座可进行360度无死角射击。售价昂贵，但与友军乘此载具协同作战，势不可挡！

source: [Left Click] to fire 2 homing missiles that deal huge damage against vehicles and zombies.
target: 按[鼠标左键]发射2枚跟踪导弹，可对敌载具和丧尸造成巨大伤害。售价昂贵，但使用得法，必成致命大杀器。

source: The Extraction Truck must be taken to its extraction zone to complete the mission.
target: 必须把此载具开到提取区域内才能获胜。

source: Silent and deadly. The knife kills enemies in a single shot.
target: 沉默而致命。 刀子一枪杀死敌人。

source: Kaboom! This will insta-kill if it explodes at your enemies feet.
target: 轰隆！如果手雷在守卫附近爆炸，他们会朝声响的方向查看。

source: Explodes with a huge flash of light that blinds nearby enemies for a few seconds. Minimise your own flash by taking cover as it explodes.
target: 爆炸并发出巨大闪光，几秒内致盲附近敌人。它爆炸时，要先躲好，别闪着自己。

source: Fires a missile that deals huge damage against vehicles and zombies.
target: 发射一发火箭弹，可对载具或丧尸群造成严重伤害。附近的守卫会朝爆炸声响的方向查看。

source: A silenced pistol with good accuracy.
target: 精度不错的无声手枪。附近的守卫不会听见开枪的动静。

source: High damage and rate of fire makes this a great sidearm - just watch out for the low ammo.
target: 很棒的副武器，高杀伤、高开火率，就是载弹量太低。像手枪一样，其子弹伤害输出与射程无关，一直保持满额杀伤力。

source: An extremely mobile superweapon that slows enemies.
target: 一种极度移动的超级武器，可以减缓敌人的速度。

source: A great run & gun weapon with the fastest movement speed in the game.
target: 超快的子弹火速对敌人严重伤害，可是特别不准。

source: A high rof and high movement speed make this a great all-round weapon.
target: 低后坐力，高移动力，总体评价很靠谱。

source: A high damage superweapon. Its bullets will bounce off walls and pierce through enemies.
target: 大杀器之一。其子弹可在墙上反弹并可击穿敌方掩体。

source: Does huge damage at point blank range.
target: 有限距离内可秒杀敌人，超出距离就不行了，只能击晕敌人。

source: An auto-shotgun with huge close range DPS. Charge up close and blast your enemies away!
target: 近距离输出惊人的自动霰弹枪。冲到敌人身边，再把他们崩飞！

source: An extremely powerful superweapon that fires explosive bullets. You can lob these bullets over walls to attack unsuspecting victims. You can also blast yourself up into the air with its explosive force by aiming at your feet.
target: 大杀器之一，发射爆炸型子弹。可以吊射绕过墙头来阴人，还可以把自己弹飞到半空中，瞄着自己脚下打。

source: Very effective at range, but you'll need to burst fire to control its recoil.
target: 长距离特别有效，可是必须站着控制后坐力。

source: Accurate and great at range. It's silenced so nearby guards won't hear you fire it.
target: 打得又准又远。附近的守卫不会听见开枪的动静。

source: An extremely accurate superweapon that fires seeking bullets. Locking on to an enemy will cause your bullets to seek towards them, dealing fast and deadly damage.
target: 大杀器之一，发射准得要命的跟踪子弹。锁定敌人，发射的子弹会自动追踪他们，输出又快又狠的伤害。

source: Has a huge clip size capable of non-stop suppressive fire.
target: 超大弹匣，可对载具输出严重伤害。移动中命中率相当糟糕，边走边射，一无所获。

source: Has a huge clip size with high damage, You'll move super slow though.
target: 超大弹匣，可对载具输出严重伤害。会减慢移动速度，移动中射击还啥都打不着。

source: An extremely high damage superweapon that deals extra damage against zombies.
target: 大杀器之一，可对载具输出严重伤害。

source: Gives you an extended scope to see further and snipe enemies off screen.
The classic sniper rifle. Fires extremely fast and accurate bullets and has a scope for increased view range.
target: 经典的狙击枪，带瞄准镜可提供额外观察范围。发射又快又准的子弹，杀伤力随飞行距离而增加。

source: An extremely long range superweapon that fires a beam of photons that penetrate enemy players and skills. Bullets actually gain damage the further they travel!
target: 长距离大杀器，发射一束光子，可击穿敌方掩体或防御技能效果。作为究极狙击武器而言，有着极高的精度和杀伤力。

source: Tosses a flaming bottle that explodes on impact. These flames persist and deal damage to anything that travels through them.
target: 投掷燃烧瓶，接触即炸，任何经过者都会被烧伤。

source: Fires a flare that sets players and vehicles on fire, causing them to take damage over time and be revealed in the map.
target: 喷火点燃敌人和车辆，造成持续烧伤，并在地图上可见。

source: An extremely deadly superweapon that shoots fire and ignites anything it touches.
target: 大杀器之一，喷火点燃击中的一切物体，造成持续烧伤，对丧尸群威力惊人。

source: Aww man, you got blood on my shirt.
target: 老铁啊，血都溅我身上了。

source: Nearby allies support you by slowly regenerating your mana and health.
target: 邻近友军正在缓慢回复你的HP和灵能。

source: Hover here to view the skills menu.
target: 鼠标停在这里可查看技能菜单。

source: click skills above to add them to the selected queue
target: 点击上面的技能，把它们加入队列。

source: You cannot queue skills unless you are playing in a Quickmatch.
target: 只有玩快速比赛才能使用技能队列。

source: Go to your spawn zone and press (B). If you run out of ammo you can rebuy your gun to get more.
target: 前往你的出生区域，按(B)键。乌兹冲锋枪是不错的武器。子弹打光时可以重买。

source: Press (ENTER) to chat. Say 'wassup' to receive a bonus 50xp!
Killing enemies will increase your score by +1.
Pick up a gun by pressing (E). Your ammo is shown at the bottom right of the screen.
Stand next to a car and press (E). Change seats with the (F-keys), and boost with Right Mouse.
Hold (ALT) and click 'Buy Skill Point' a few times. Then spend these points on the skill 'Self Repair'.
Cast Self Repair with Right Click. Your skill hotkeys are shown down the bottom left of the screen.
This is the Outbreak game mode. To win you need to kill zombies, collect their souls and return them to the bomb. Try using skills with large splash damage.
target: 这里是大爆发游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要击杀丧尸，收集掉落的尸魂，再回填到炸弹里并引爆。尽量使用范围杀伤，要比仅用枪射击有效得多。

source: After collecting souls you need to return them to the bomb. You'll gain score, cash, mana, hp and XP for every soul you return. Follow the arrow on your screen to take your souls to the bomb. Hold (TAB) to see your score.
target: 收集尸魂后，需要回填到炸弹里，每次回填都有分数、金钱、灵能、HP和经验奖励。按HUD上显示的白色箭头行动，把尸魂填入炸弹。按住(TAB)键可查看分数。

source: Time to teleport! Press (B) to buy the 'Warp Field' chemical.
Hold (CTRL) to place the Warp Field on the ground. It's important to note that enemies can't see your chemicals after you've placed them.
Stand inside the warp, Hold (ALT), and click the arrow next to you. This teleport you to other warps!

This is the Conquest game mode where you need to capture all of the Control Points in the map. You do this with the 'Capturer' chemical. Wait for your team to get enough kills (shown by the green bar under the minimap) then buy a Capturer.
target: 这里是征服游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要购买并放置捕获器药剂来占领地图上所有的控制点。攒够了钱，就在基础药剂前按(B)键购买一个捕获器吧。

source: Control Points are the red biohazard symbols in the map. To capture one, hold (CTRL) and place your Capturer on top of it. Hold (TAB) to see scores.
This is the Extraction game mode. Follow the white arrow on your screen to capture your team's flag.
target: 这里是提取游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要占领目标（像是旗帜、电台或卡车），并带回对应的提取区域。按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，占领当前目标。

source: Follow the arrow and take the flag to the enemy flag near your spawn. Hold (TAB) to see your score.
target: 一旦占领了目标，就必须提取它。按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，到达对应提取区域。成功提取目标，可奖励己方全员大量分数，所以好好配合吧！按住(TAB)键来查看分数。

source: This is the Checkpoint game mode. To win you need to pick up the Battery with a vehicle. Enter a vehicle, then follow the white arrow on your screen to pick up the Battery.
target: 这里是剧情点游戏模式。想赢得游戏，需要捡起电池，放进载具，完成通过全部剧情点的跑圈。购买载具，按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，占领电池。

source: Follow the white arrow on your screen to drive the battery through each of the checkpoints. Hold (TAB) to see your score.
target: 载着电池，完成通过全部剧情点的跑圈。按HUD上白色箭头指示行动，通过全部重生点。如果是敌方载着电池，你可以在设置路障妨害他们跑圈。按住(TAB)键来查看分数。

source: You can destroy enemy chemicals if you guess their location. Buy the 'Neutralizer' chemical and place it where you think an enemy chemical is hidden (hold CTRL).
You've completed the Newbie Checklist! Press (F10) to finish this tutorial. This opens the How to Play Guide if you want to learn more.
Win a round to earn +20 points. The first player to 50 points wins. Your score is shown under the minimap.
Stand inside a buy zone (shown as yellow circles in the map), then press (B) to buy ammo.
After you complete a challenge, press (ESC) to claim it. Challenges award you items and XP, which you use to expand your buy menu.
Learn to play! Press (SHIFT) to Shift. Shifts are shown as blue triangles down the bottom of the screen.
Get a score of 50 to gain double damage - then win one final round. Winning matches gives you kill coins, which you use to unlock new items.
Select your knife with (3) and hold the mouse to charge it. Once you turn red you can kill in a single shot.
Learn to play and earn bonus XP!
target: 试着按新手指南操作吧！顺序完成每个步骤，都有经验值奖励！

没时间解释了，快发车吧？

Follow the arrow on your screen to reach the next checkpoint. Try to earn combo kills to gain extra cash.
target: 按屏幕箭头指示，到达下一个剧情点。试着打出连杀，可获得额外金钱奖励。消灭丧尸，收集尸魂并填充到炸弹里，就能引爆了。

source: What if I miss some text?
target: 我漏掉了一些信息提示怎么办？

source: Press (ENTER) to bring up the chat log. The green lines have important tips. Also when playing singleplayer you can hold (ALT) to pause the game and read the text at your own pace.
target: 按回车键打开聊天记录，绿字信息都是重要提示。单人游戏时，也可按住(ALT)键暂停游戏，慢慢阅读提示信息。

source: Stay out of combat briefly to heal yourself. Buy weapons (B) when standing inside a circular checkpoint. Finally, unlock healing skills (ALT) and cast them with Right Click, C and Z.
You gain +1 point per kill, and +20 points if you're the last man standing. When you reach enough points you'll gain double damage. The game will then end when you win your next round.
target: 每次击杀你获得+1点，如果你是最后一个站立的人则获得更多积分。 当你达到足够的分数时，你将获得双重伤害。 当你赢得下一轮比赛时，比赛将结束。

source: Avoid the circle of death and try to stay alive. If you become a zombie, use this time to loot for cash, and build a network of chemicals. Use Warp Fields to quickly teleport to the center buy zone.
target: 避免死亡圈，并试着活着。 如果你成为一个僵尸，利用这段时间抢劫现金，技能和化学品。 使用Warp Fields快速传送到中心购买区。

source: When you view the skills page through the main menu you're looking at your permanent skill build. This build is only used in permanent multiplayer servers and persists between rounds. This build is not used in quickmatches or the campaign.
target: 通过主菜单浏览到技能页面，现在看到的是你的永久技能组合。此组合只可用于永久多人服务器，比赛中不可更改。此组合不可用于快速比赛或战役模式。

source: Here you can host multiplayer modes and play against bots. To play against humans it's usually better to join an official server.
target: 你或许不想看见这些信息。想玩多人游戏，请加入官方服务器！想与朋友们一起玩战役模式，请点击战役模式页面，再加入游戏即可。

source: C'mon, let's finish their game once and for all.
target: 来吧，让我们一劳永逸地完成他们的比赛。

source: C'mon, let's get to the warp. We've gotta go!
target: 来吧，让我们来看看经线。 我们得走了！

source: C'mon, this place is about to collapse.
target: 来吧，这个地方即将崩溃。

source: C'mon, we can get to HQ by boat.
target: 来吧，我们可以乘船前往总部。

source: Can you take me home? This way.
target: 你可以带我回家吗？这个方向。

source: Can you take this new guy to the boss?
target: 你可以带这个新人到大佬吗？

source: Careful of this green stuff, it's radioactive.
target: 小心这青色的东西，放射性的。

source: Careful sir, there are zombies down here.

target: 小心，蓝色的家伙很痛的。

target: 小心。这些克隆有点。。。僵尸样。

source: Cause if we can't kill zombies...
target: 因为如果我们不能杀僵尸的话。。。

source: Cheers. Take this as a token of our gratitude.
Come Knickers. Join the dark side!
target: 来吧老兄。 加入黑暗的一面！

source: Come out, come out, wherever you are!
Cool your jets gramps. We just saved you.
target: 冷却您的喷气式飞机。 我们救了你

source: Could you uhh.. take out the trash?
target: 你可以。。把垃圾拿出去吗？

source: Dear diary... Yesterday HQ installed a new water fountain
Destroy the source, save the world, and get the girl. You ready?
target: 摧毁来源，拯救世界，让后去救那女孩。你准备好了吗？

source: Down there. Go now and be free.
Dude we get to hunt zombies.. It's like a video game!
target: 我们有的捕猎僵尸。。这很像一个游戏！

source: Escort the old man to his home.
Escort the test-subjects to the checkpoint.
target: 将测试品护送到重生点。

source: Escort the truck to the extraction zone safely.
target: 将卡车安全地护送到提取区。

source: Ew, more of this green stuff. Smells like death.
target: 呃，更多这些绿色的东西。 闻起来像死亡。

source: Exactly. And now we have something to do.
target: 对了。我们现在就有东西做了。
终于！ 我的标本到了......

source: Finally.. Let's go do some science!
target: 终于..让我们去做一些科学！

source: Finally.. you will respect me for the boss I am!
target: 终于......你会尊重我的老板我！

source: Fun? They've gone nuts! They started an outbreak.
target: 好玩吗？ 他们疯了！ 他们爆发了疫情。

source: God the security here is awful.
target: 这里的保安措施真是他妈的糟糕。

source: God, what would we do without this stuff?!
target: 没有这些东西，我们怎么办呀？！

source: Good. This experiment was getting out of control.
target: 很好。这试验越来越失控了。

source: Great technique sir. You're conducting yourself amazingly!
target: 伟大的技术先生。 你是在惊人地表现自己！

source: Great timing huh.. You cool to drive?
target: 时间刚刚好。你可以驾吗？

source: Guys that water is filthy. What are you doing?
target: 水是脏的。 你在做什么？

source: Have you unlocked those train doors yet?
target: 你有解锁那些火车门吗？

source: He needed ammo and a few health kits. Not dozens of skills!
target: 他需要弹药和一些医疗包。 不是几十个技能！

source: He wasn't meant to get this far! You dropped him too many supplies.
target: 他本来不打算走这么远！ 你丢弃了太多的物资。

source: He's a super mutant. Of course he'd grow powerful.
target: 他是一个超级变种人。 他当然会变得强大起来。

source: He's the mercenary we hired sir. He's helping me fight these Rebels.
target: 他是我们聘请的雇佣兵先生。 他在帮助我对抗这些反叛者。
总部一定在一个地方制作。

source: Hey could you pass a hammer?
Hey man you're from HQ right?
Hey man, you've got skills. Heal me!
target: 嘿，伙计，你有技巧。 医治我！

source: Hey screw you! And screw your damn tests.
target: 嘿搞砸了！ 并搞砸你的该死的测试。

source: Hey tough guys, come out here!
Hey you're from HQ! Can you open this door?
target: 喂，你是从总部的！你可以开这道门吗？

source: Hey. You're the new security guy right?
Hmm.. How do we get out of here?
Hmm.. they must be looking for HQ's base.
target: 嗯..他们一定在寻找总部的基地。

source: Hold [ALT] and click the blue arrow to warp.
target: 按住[ALT]并单击蓝色箭头以扭曲。

source: Hold [ALT] to level skills from the top of the HUD. Press [V] to cycle the skill hotkeys down the bottom left.
Hold [Right Click] to boost over the gap.
target: 按住[右键单击]以增加间隙。
按住[右键单击]进行提升。

source: Holy shit!! I'm such a badass!
How do I keep forgetting that..
How'd you get back there? That's for HQ only.
target: 你怎么去到后面呀？那是给总部而已。

source: Huh, a Warp Field. That's convenient..
target: 嗯，经编场。 那很方便..

source: Hundreds of men. Armed with our strongest skills.
target: 数百名男子。 拥有我们最强大的技能。

source: I always fight alone. It looks cooler.
target: 我一直都自己战斗。看起来比较酷

source: I can lock the trains. But you need to take care of these Rebels.
target: 我可以锁定火车。 但你需要照顾这些反叛者。

source: I can't keep track of how many zombies you've killed.
target: 我都忘了我杀了多少个僵尸

source: I can't wait any longer.. Guards, kill them!
target: 我不能等了。。保安，杀他们！

source: I could have achieved so much!!
I don't care how powerful he is. Find the test-subject!
target: 我不在乎他有多强大。 找到测试品！

source: I dunno where this goes. But anywhere is better than here.
target: ：我不知道这是怎么回事。 但任何地方都比这里更好。

source: I feel that red suits my personality better, hot and passionate.
target: 我觉得红色更适合我的个性，热情和热血。

source: I forgot I could do that..
I heard an explosion. Who detonated the western fail-safe?
target: 我听到爆炸声。 谁引爆了西方的自动防故障？

source: I hope you're worth it.. or this was all for nothing.
target: 我希望你值得......或者这一切都是无用的。

source: I just needed a sample of your winning DNA...
target: 我只需要你获胜DNA的样本......

source: I know. And if they get onto the trains they'll infect the entire city.
target: 我知道。 如果他们上火车，他们将感染整个城市。

source: I respected you far more as a scientist.
target: 作为一名科学家，我更尊重你。

source: I see you met the previous test-subjects.
target: ：我看到你遇到了以前的测试品。

source: I sure am. I prepared this speech months ago.
target: 我确定。 几个月前我准备了这个演讲。

source: I think I know why the Rebels went crazy.
target: 我想我知道为什么反叛分子发疯了。

source: I threw down some supplies. Can you get those Tasers?
target: 我扔了一些补给品。 你能得到那些泰瑟枪吗？

source: I turned the Rebels violent for one simple reason...
target: 因为一个简单的原因，我让反叛者变得暴力......

source: I was busy changing my shirt.
I was special forces before  HQ hired me as security.
I won't wear Scientist colors any more. And this red really pops!
target: 我不会再穿科学家的颜色了。 而这个红色真的很流行！

source: I'd do it myself, but uhhh.. I injured my back lifting test tubes.
target: 我自己做，但是呃......我的背部抬起试管受伤了。

source: I'd just thought he was into Star Wars cosplay.
target: 我只是觉得他参加了星球大战的角色扮演。

source: I'll admit - I'm a tad more aggressive than usual..
target: 我承认 - 我比往常更有攻击性......

source: I'll toss it down for you. Over here.
I'm all jacked up. On pure adrenaline.. and you still beat me?!
target: 我全都搞砸了。 在纯粹的肾上腺素..你仍然打败了我？！

source: I'm calling it now... they're the real bad guys.
target: 我现在正打电话给他们......他们是真正的坏人。

source: I'm just a bit nervous. I dunno if I can do this.
target: 我只是有点紧张。我不懂我可不可以完成这。

source: I'm mostly here for moral support.. and advancing the plot.
target: 我主要是为了道义上的支持......并且推进了这个阴谋。

source: I'm reviewing the security footage now. It wasn't one of us.
target: 我现在正在审查安全镜头。 这不是我们中的任何一个。

source: I'm serious son.. there's something special about you.
target: 我是认真的。。你看起来有点特别。

source: I'm sorry! I'm too beautiful to die.
I've watched you play my game for a while now...
target: 我已经注意你玩我的游戏很久了。。。

source: If the one below explodes we'll lose everything.
target: 如果下面的爆的话我们就全都没了。

source: If this ever happens again.. we'll be ready.
target: 如果这再次发生。。我们会准备好的。

source: If you're gunna save the world might as well do it in style, right??
target: 如果你要拯救世界，不妨在风格上做到这一点，对吧？

source: In all my years I've never seen someone so.. gifted.
target: 在我这么多年里，我从来没有见过这样的人......有天赋。

source: In completely unrelated news.. I'm feeling a bit strange this morning
Indeed.. Let's scan the room in an elaborate yet predictable manner.
target: 确实..让我们以精心设计但可预测的方式扫描房间。

source: Irritable. Aggressive even.. very unlike me.
It helps us focus. More drive. More aggression!
It might help you in your adventures. Follow me.
target: 它可能会帮助你的冒险。 跟着我。

source: It'd make these escort missions way easier.
target: 它使这些护送任务更容易。

source: It's all top secret stuff. We really shouldn't be here.
target: 这全都是机密。我们不应该在这。

source: It's like a drug. Hook it to my veins!
target: 这就像一种毒品。 钩住我的血管！

source: It's not senseless. We have a purpose. We're looking for the source.
target: 这不是没有意义的。 我们有一个目的。 我们正在寻找消息来源。
一切都会变好的。。我到了。

source: It's the only way to test his genetic code.
target: 这是测试他的遗传密码的唯一方法。

source: Just take a deep breath and relax.
Just you wait.. the ceiling is about to come down.
target: 你等等吧。。天花板已经要倒下了。

source: Kill 30 zombies to detonate the bomb.
Kill them on sight. We cannot let them find HQ!
target: 杀死他们的视线。 我们不能让他们找到总部！

source: Let me repay you. In my hidings I found a magical unlock.
target: 让我报答你。 在我的隐居中，我发现了一个神奇的解锁。

source: Let us ride in an automobile.
Let's get out of here! This place is about to collapse.
target: 我们快点离开这！这个地方要倒了。

source: Let's just go to the next level, OK?
target: 让我们进入下一个级别，好吗？
让我们把它混合起来..重复!!

source: Listen up! These nutjobs are out of control.
target: 听着！ 这些坚果不受控制。

source: Lock and load guys, I need an escort.
target: 锁定和加载人员，我需要一个护送。

source: Look I know it's your first day.. but there's been a rebellion.
target: 看，我知道这是你的第一天..但是有一次反叛。

source: Look I'm trying to create a sense of urgency here...
target: 看，我试图在这里创造一种紧迫感......

source: Look Knickers, we've gotta go. Try to relax ok?
target: 看看老兄，我们得走了。 试着放松一下好吗？

source: Looks like the Rebels have been cut off.
target: 看起来反叛者已被切断。

source: Man what is this green stuff? It stinks!
target: 这些青色的东西是什么呀？很臭！

source: Most test-subjects died on the first level...
target: 大多数测试品在第一级死亡......

source: My boss is evil... Now I see why he wears that cape and scary helmet.
target: 一定是来源......我的老板是邪恶的...现在我明白为什么他戴着斗篷和可怕的头盔。

source: Nice, I think that's all of them.
target: 不错，我觉得有那么多罢了。

source: Nice, some skill points. I'd put some points into Self Repair.
No no, the water is fine. And here, we can prove it.
target: 不，水很好。 在这里，我们可以证明这一点。

source: No please!!! You said we could live if -
target: 拜托不要！！！你说我们可以活的如果 -

source: No thanks. Senseless violence ain't my thing.
target: 还是算了。毫无知觉的暴力我可不喜欢。

source: No. I think it was the test subject.
target: 不，我认为这是科学实验。

source: Not them either sir.. It looks like the test-subject.
target: 先生！不是他们..它看起来像测试品。

source: Not yet sir. He's quite.. strong.
Now.. what was that damn pass -
OK there's the exit. Go now and be free!
target: OK 出口就在那。快点出去吧！

source: Of course, it's at sea. Come on, let's go!
target: 当然，它在海上。 来吧，我们走吧！

source: Oh cool, headquarters is dropping supplies.
target: 哦，很酷，总部正在减少供应。

source: Oh cool, you guys killing zombies??
Oh god this water feels soooooo good!
target: 哦，上帝这水感觉太好了！

source: Oh hey Knickers. The Rebels captured us.
target: 哦，嘿老兄。 反叛分子占领了我们。

source: Oh look, it's the new guy.. You're doing a great job out there!
target: 哦，看，这是新人..你在那里做得很好！

source: Oh man.. we blew it all up!
Oh my God. I can see the edge of the map!
target: 哦，我的上帝。 我可以看到地图的边缘！

source: Oh no.. I've been captured... somehow.
target: 哦不..我被抓获了...不知何故。

source: Oh please. You both look the same.
target: 哦拜托。 你们看起来都一样。

source: Oh shit we crashed! That's my bad.
target: 哦，我们崩溃了！ 那是我的坏事。

source: Oh shit, are you guys OK?
Oh shit, you tripped the alarm. Hurry up, they're coming for us!
target: 他妈的，你绊倒了警报。 快点，他们来找我们！

source: Oh yeah, the Rebel's live here. Let's sneak inside.
target: 哦是的，反叛者住在这里。 让我们潜入里面。

source: Oh.. could you give us a gun?
target: 哦。。你可以给我们一把枪吗？

source: Ok I'll try. What's the password?
Ok I'm done. God's of science.. I'm ready!
target: 好了，我完成了。 上帝的科学......我准备好了！

source: Ok guys, move on up! Almost there.
target: 好的，继续前进！ 差不多了。

source: Ok so.. if you had just ONE weakness.. what would it be?
target: 好的..如果你只有一个弱点......它会是什么？

source: Ok, newbies. Grab a gun and help us find the source.
target: 好的，新手。 拿枪，帮助我们找到源头。

source: Ok, no problem.. Move out team.
Ok, well.. can you open this one then? We've gotta get inside.
One last thing though.. Kill them.
Ooo yeah... Self Repair feels gooood!
target: 真棒......自我修复感觉很糟糕！

source: Oooh a journal. Gimme that backstory.
target: 哦，一本期刊。 给我那个背景故事。

source: Open the doors! I gotta get out of here!
Or at least.. it can't be safe. C'mon let's go!
target: 或者至少......它不安全。 来吧！

source: Our only hope is to warp out of here.
target: 我们唯一的希望是摆脱这里。

source: Ow! Those blue guys really hurt.
target: 噢！ 那些蓝人真的受伤了。

source: Press [B] to buy ammo from the yellow checkpoint.
Protect the test-subjects from the HQ scientists.
target: 保护科学实验品免受总部科学家的影响。

source: Remember, we need to capture one alive.
target: 我们只需要抓一个活的回来。

source: See that bomb? We can use it to wipe out the zombies.
target: 你看到那个炸弹吗？我们可以使用它来炸烂僵尸。

source: Short story. How do we get outta here?
target: 我们怎么从这里出去呢？

source: Silence slave! Just don't bump me.
target: 沉默的奴隶！ 只是不要碰我。

source: Sir, we're trying to stop the test-subject. But he's grown too strong.
target: 先生，我们正试图阻止测试对象。 但他变得太强壮了。

source: So in other words.. you want drugs.
So no, we're pretty far from OK. Now get us out of here!
target: 不，我们离好差很远。快点把我们带走！

source: So that's the source huh.. Destroy that the game is up.
target: 那看起来就是来源。。把他打烂就结束了。

source: So uhh, remind me again.. where are we?
target: 你可以在跟我说我们在哪吗？

source: So we decided to find the perfect specimen..
target: 所以我们决定找到完美的标本..

source: So what do you say.. Ready for another day in the Lab?
target: 那么你怎么说..准备在实验室的另一天？

source: Some lab techs.. They're releasing the clones!
target: 一些实验室技术人员......他们正在释放克隆！

source: Something must've happened there. Let's check it out.
target: 这里应该发生过东西，我们过去看看吧。

source: Sorry no can do.. That would make things too easy.
target: 对不起，不能。那会使一切太容易了。

source: Stand still inside the Warp, hold [ALT] and click the blue arrow up the top of the screen.
target: 静止在摆脱内，按住[ALT]并单击屏幕顶部的蓝色箭头。

source: Stay back a bit, would you?
Take a look.. It's just a drug that HQ developed.
target: 来看看。。这是总部发明的毒品。

source: Take him to the boss. I'll check inside.
target: 带他去见老大。我进去看看。

source: Thank you. You're a gentleman and a scholar.
target: 谢谢。你看起来是一个绅士。

source: Thanks. C'mon let's get out of here.
That must be the source. Destroy that and it game over man. Game over.
target: 那应该就是来源。把他打烂就结束了。

source: The Lab of course. The zombies went crazy. Swarmed us!
target: 实验室当然。 僵尸疯了。 我们蜂拥而至！

source: The Rebels were a test. A challenge.. A game.
target: 反叛分子是一个考验。 挑战..一场比赛。

source: The better the code.. the better the skills.
The boss called. He's seen enough.
The boss is impressed.. He's promoted you to HQ!
target: 老板蛮喜欢你的。。他把你升级到总部了！

source: The hell? Did the Rebels do this?
target: 什么鬼？ 反叛者这样做了吗？
入侵者!! 他杀了所有人！

source: The other fail-safe is through here.
target: 另一个故障安全就是通过这里。

source: The outbreak! The supply drops. The checkpoints...
target: 爆发！ 供应下降。 重生点......

source: The source of the water. Where it's most pure.
target: 水的来源。 它最纯净的地方。

source: The source will be ours! Mwahahaha!
target: 来源将是我们的！哇哈哈哈！

source: The source? They just gasped for air and dropped dead.
target: 来源？他们一呼吸就死了。

source: The test-subject? He's here!? I ordered you fools to capture him!
target: 测试品？ 他在这儿！？ 我命令你傻瓜抓住他！

source: Then who? The Rebels? They don't know where we are.
target: 还有谁？ 叛军？ 他们不知道我们在哪里。

source: There are more civilians in here.
There are still a few Rebels down there.
There they are. Let's find a way in there.
target: 它们就在那。我们找一个路上去吧。

source: There's the bomb. You two stay up here. We'll head down.
target: 炸弹在那里。你们两个留在这，我们下去。
这些子弹一直在我脸前飞过。。。

source: They all lived in the same place - it's a few blocks south of here.
target: 他们都生活在同一个地方 - 这是在这里以南几个街区。

source: They gave me a grenade! But maybe you should have it.
target: 他们给了我一个手榴弹！可是我觉得你使用更好。

source: They really should've made these barriers see-through.
target: 他们真的应该让这些障碍透明化。

source: They'll attack when you least suspect -
target: 在你不怀疑的时候，他们就会攻击 -

source: They're all built from a genetic code.
target: 它们都是用遗传密码构建的。

source: They're coming! How am I gunna get out..
target: 他们来着了！我如何出去呢。。

source: They've been running tests on us for weeks..
target: 他们已经在我们身体做了很多试验。。

source: They've swarmed the bomb. Lemme help.
target: 他们已经挤满了炸弹。 让我来帮忙。

source: They've swarmed the city. We gotta go!
target: 他们包围了整个城市，我们快走吧！

source: Things were quiet 'till you lot showed up!
target: 事情很安静'直到你出现了很多！

source: Think of all the skills we develop...
target: 想想我们开发的所有技能......

source: This is crazy! You're loco man. Just don't get tunnel vision!
This is the Rebel quarters. Let's find a way in there.
target: 这是反派宿舍。 让我们在那里找到一种方式。

source: This isn't a movie. He's not James Bond! Just capture him!
target: 这不是一部电影，快抓住他！

source: This isn't good.. the outbreak is spreading.
This story is almost over. I can feel it!
target: 我感觉到这故事要完了！

source: To prove his strength. To use his winning DNA.
target: 证明自己的实力。 使用他的获胜DNA。

source: To see if you could beat them...
To teleport, stand in the Warp Field, hold [ALT] and click the blue arrow.
target: 要传送，站在经编场中，按住[ALT]并单击蓝色箭头。

source: Try blast them with your Force Fields.
target: 尝试用你的力场爆破它们。

source: Try kill him with your Force Field explosion.
target: 尝试使用你的力场爆炸杀死他。

source: Try that keypad. Same code as always. 1234.
target: 试试键盘。 代码一如既往。1234。

source: Turn that thing off. We're under attack!
target: 把那东西关掉。我们正在被袭击！

source: Ugh. We really have to stop placing bombs in our secret bases..
target: 啊。我们真的需停止在我们的秘密基地投放炸弹。。

source: Ugh. You actually did it.. you defeated me.
target: 啊.。你真的做到了..你打败了我。

source: Uhhh sir? Our filtration system was destroyed.
target: 呃先生？我们的过滤系统被破坏了。

source: Uhmm Will... You sure it's safe up there?
Use it wisely. Shoot straight and true. All the best, kind traveller.
target: 明智地使用它。 射准和真实。 所有最好的，善良旅行者。

source: Very well. You leave me no choice.
Wait you can't kill me! I'm essential to the plot -
target: 等你不能杀了我！ 我对情节很重要 -

source: Wait!! I'll tell you. Just let us live.
target: 等！！我告诉你。给我们活吧。

source: We captured one of them. Come quick!
target: 我们捕获了其中一个。 快点来！

source: We captured the final Rebels too. They're locked in the garage.
target: 我们也抓住了最后的反叛者。 他们被锁在车库里。

source: We don't know the coordinates yet.
We got lost... how do we get out of here??
target: 我们迷路了...我们怎么离开这里？

source: We had it all wrong. The world is flat after all.
target: 我们错了。 毕竟世界是平的。

source: We had to give him skills to see how he'd use them.
target: 我们必须给他技能，看看他是如何使用它们的。

source: We have orders to capture him, dead or alive!
target: 我们有命令捕获他，无论死亡还是活着！

source: We have to detonate this bomb to clear the contamination.
target: 我们必须引爆这枚炸弹以清除污染。

source: We have to go around, c'mon!
We might as well check it out.
We need his code...  Bring him to me. Dead or alive.
target: 我们需要他的代码......带他去找我。 死或生。

source: We never should have drugged you fools. You've gone insane!
target: 我们永远不应该给你傻瓜。 你疯了！

source: We opened doors to guide you.. Gave you just enough cash to fight.
target: 我打开了一些门来指引你。。给你刚刚好的钱去战斗。

source: We spashed around a bit. Pretty cool I guess, though the water smells awful
We'd drug some Rebels. Then hire someone to save the day.
target: 我们给一些反叛者加药。 然后聘请某人来挽救这一天。

source: We'll destroy the source and save the world!
target: 我们会摧毁来源后拯救世界！

source: We'll load the zombies on when we're done.
target: 我们完成后会加载僵尸。

source: We'll take you to him... Just step in here...
target: 我们会带你去见他。。。你来着先。。。

source: We're not giving you shit. Now if you're done monologuing...
target: 我们什么都不会给的。你长篇大论完了后。。。

source: We're not here to play games. We're here to stop you.
target: 我们不是在这里玩游戏，我们是来阻止你的。

source: We're trying! But he's a super mutant. That's the whole point!
target: 我们正在努力！ 但他是一个超级突变体。 这就是重点！

source: We've already play-tested so many skills...
target: 我们已经玩了很多技能...

source: We've gotta get these civilians outta here.
target: 我们一定要把平民带走。

source: We've run the test so many times...
target: 我们做了这个实验很多次了。。。

source: Well he's proven himself. So for the love of God kill him.
target: 他证明了自己。 所以，因为上帝的爱杀了他。

source: Well let us help. I wanna test these sweet blades!
target: 好吧，让我们帮忙吧。 我想测试这些甜刀片！

source: Well my friend does most of the actual killing..
target: 其实大多数都是我朋友杀的。。

source: Well that's just asking to be explored!
target: 那不就在叫我们去探险吗？

source: Welp, this is it. The final showdown.
target: 好，就是这样。 最后的摊牌。

source: What a twist! HQ drugged the Rebels.
target: 太棒了！ 总部给反叛分子注入毒品。

source: What are they doing anyway.. they're just walking in circles.
target: 他们在做什么。。他们在转圈圈呀。

source: What the hell is going on up here?
What the hell!? Johnson, get out here!
What the.. how'd you do that?
What's the matter buddy? Are you ok?
target: 什么事好友？ 你还好吗？

source: What, drugging the Rebels? It's for the greater good.
target: 什么，吸毒反叛者？ 这是为了更大的利益。

source: When fuelled by violence.. It's such a rush!
target: 在暴力的推动下......这是如此匆忙！

source: Where is HQ? Where do you make the water?!
target: 总部在哪？水怎么创造的？！

source: Why I oughta... I'll teach them a thing or two!
target: 为什么我要...我会教他们一两件事！

source: Why are the Rebels doing all this anyway?
target: 为什么反叛分子还在做这一切？

source: Why do they call us.. test-subjects?
target: 他们为什么叫我们...测试品？

source: Woop woop. The boss is here!
Yeah but there are hundreds of us.
target: 对啊可是我们有几百个。

source: Yeah sorry about that throw. I'm not very coordinated.
target: 那投掷很对不起。 我不是很协调。

source: Yeah, but it's cool.. They're a lot of fun.
target: 是的，可是很酷。。他们很好玩的。

source: Yeah, but then the Rebels went crazy.. and you have too!
target: 是的，但是反叛者疯了......你也是！

source: Yeauk this water stinks! What is HQ doing down here?
target: 咦这水很臭！ 什么是总部在这里做什么？

source: Yes!! C'mon man we're saving the world here!
target: 对！！你这个家伙我们现在在拯救世界！

source: You beat me at my own game...
You can use this to teleport directly to the bomb.
target: 你可以使用这个瞬间移动到炸弹。

source: You could've opened that door a bit earlier..
You damn fools! You don't know what -
You drugged the Rebels and sent them insane. Why??
target: 你让反叛分子吸毒了并让他们疯了。 为什么？？

source: You go ahead. Try not to get bit.

target: 你们可以转变吗？令人印象深刻。

source: You ready? Click the blue arrow up top and let's warp outta here!
target: 你准备好了吗？按那上面的蓝箭把我们出去吧！

source: You saved me! Take this cash as thanks.
target: 你救了我！这笔钱给你当作感谢吧。

source: You sure you don't want to join us?
You want me to open that door down there?
You'll do WHAT to my mother!?
You're not going to start monologuing, are you?
You're not like these other weaklings.
target: 你不喜欢这些其他的弱者。

source: You're too cliche for me. Now take this!
target: 你对我来说太陈词滥调了。 现在拿这个吧！

source: You're too late - the clones are free!
target: 你来不及了 - 克隆逃走了！

source: You've got skills man. That cape suits you.
target: 你有技能的男人。 那斗篷适合你。

source: You've knocked those zombies off the rails! Don't run out of steam!
target: 你已经把那些僵尸从铁轨上撞了下来！ 不要用完蒸汽！

source: Your game has worked a little too well...
target: 你的游戏运作得太好了。。。

source: [Left Click] to fire the stinger missiles.
